contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {|{{Infobox Ship Begin}} {{Infobox Ship Image |Ship image= |Ship caption= }} {{Infobox Ship Career |Hide header= |Ship country= |Ship flag= [[Image:British-Royal-Fleet-Auxiliary-Ensign.svg|100x35px|Royal Fleet Auxiilary Ensign]] |Ship name= RFA ''Fort Langley'' |Ship namesake= |Ship ordered= |Ship builder= |Ship laid down= |Ship launched= 31 October 1944, as ''Montebello Park'' |Ship acquired= |Ship commissioned= 18 May 1945, as ''Fort Langley'' |Ship decommissioned=February 1970 |Ship in service= |Ship out of service= |Ship struck= 1970 |Ship renamed= |Ship homeport= |Ship motto= |Ship nickname= |Ship honours= |Ship fate= Sold for scrapping, 1970 |Ship status= |Ship notes= }} {{Infobox Ship Characteristics |Hide header= |Header caption= |Ship class= |Ship tonnage={{GRT|7263|first=yes}}<br />{{NetT|4018||first=caps}}<br />{{DWT|7543|metric|first=yes}} |Ship displacement= |Ship length= {{Convert|441|ft|6|in|m|abbr=on}} |Ship beam= {{Convert|57|ft|2|in|m|abbr=on}} |Ship draught= {{Convert|27|ft|m|abbr=on}} |Ship propulsion=1 × 3-cylinder triple expansion steam engine, {{Convert|2500|ihp|0|abbr=on}}<br />1 shaft |Ship speed= {{Convert|11|kn|lk=in}} |Ship range= {{Convert|11400|nmi|km|abbr=on}} at {{Convert|10|kn|abbr=on}} |Ship complement=115 |Ship sensors= |Ship EW= |Ship armament=''World War II'' :<br />• 1 × {{Convert|4|in|mm|abbr=on}} gun<br/ >• 8 × 20 mm AA guns |Ship armour= |Ship aircraft= |Ship aircraft facilities= |Ship notes= }} |} '''RFA ''Fort Langley'' (A230)''' was a stores ship of the [[Royal Fleet Auxiliary]]. The ship was launched on October 1944 as ''Montebello Park'', and was commissioned on 18 May 1945 as ''Fort Langley''. Transferred to the RFA in May 1954, she was decommissioned in February 1970, and laid up at [[HMNB Devonport|Devonport]]. ''Fort Langley'' arrived at [[Bilbao]] for scrapping on 21 July 1970. ==See also== *[[RFA Fort Charlotte (A236)]] *[[RFA Fort Duquesne (A229)]] *[[RFA Fort Rosalie (A186)]] *[[Fort Cataraqui (ship)]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Fort Langley}} [[Category:Ships of the Royal Fleet Auxiliary]] [[Category:1944 ships]] {{UK-aux-ship-stub}}
